PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

PUBLIC



Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing well, 

 

Thank you for below renewal confirmation. We hereby confirm binding cover for the Property policy for the period 2024/25.

 

Please note there is a slight update in sum insured and premium calculation as per attached excel.

 

Renewal sum insured BD 22,988,326/-

 

Renewal Premium BD 10,345/- + 10% VAT 

 

We will issue renewal documents and send it to you in short .

 

Regards

 

Aqeela 

 

From: Mariam Husain Ali Mandeel <mariam.mandeel@gig-gulf.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 1:04 PM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Thank you for your confirmation.

Subject: ASHRAF BGDC CO FOR PERFUMES & COSMETICS W.L.L - 2023 Renewal

 

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

With reference to the property insurance policy of Style Avenue Bahrain, kindly note that there was significant damages to the SAKS store at Bahrain City Center due to today’s rains.

 

Appreciate if you can assist to relay the same to your claims team to open a claims file.

 

Also, in case you will appoint a loss adjustor to visit the site today, the surveyor can co-ordinate with Mr. Ali, our head of security, at +973 39061863 to co-ordinate for an inspection.

 

Count on your support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

Subject: ASHRAF BGDC CO FOR PERFUMES & COSMETICS W.L.L - 2023 Renewal

 

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

Subject: ASHRAF BGDC CO FOR PERFUMES & COSMETICS W.L.L - 2023 Renewal

 

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

Subject: ASHRAF BGDC CO FOR PERFUMES & COSMETICS W.L.L - 2023 Renewal

 

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

t to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

PUBLIC

 

Good day, 

Hope you are doing great, 

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.

We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further.

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned policies are due for renewal during 24th Sep 2023, detailed as below:

 

*	CGL policy No. 60/PC/30042/0/7 – BHD 804.100/-  (Premium BHD 731/- + 10% VAT) 
*	Property all risks policy No. 60/FA/70765/0/10 – BHD 10,392.800 /- (Premium BHD 9448/- + 10% VAT)

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

 

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA.

Important Notices:

 

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We, therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR & KYC along with the renewal instructions.

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further. Should you require any more clarifications please feel free to contact us, contact details as below.

 

Best regards,

 

Abeer Ali

Commercial Underwriting Executive – P&C Commercial Lines



Headquarters, Bahrain Bay

Unit 51, Bldg. 298, Road 4609, Block 346

P.O. Box 11442, Manama / Sea Front, Kingdom of Bahrain

Tel +973 66328227 | Email: Abeer.Mohsin.ext@gig-gulf.com <mailto:mariam.mandeel@gig-gulf.com>
